titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Frederick J. Mahaffey, School of Fine Arts, Yale University, Correspondence and Memorabilia
Mahaffey (Frederick), School of Fine Arts, Yale University, Correspondence and Memorabilia
titlestmt.author: compiled by Michael Lotstein

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:46

did.unittitle: Frederick J. Mahaffey, School of Fine Arts, Yale University, correspondence and memorabilia

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of correspondence, photographs, and memorabilia relating to Frederick J. Mahaffey, BArch, 1953. Included are letters written to a friend, George Browner Cash, BArch 1956; photographs of a student architecture project to build a geodesic dome; eulogy by Mahaffey for Nelson J. Palmer, BArch 1953; and related academic materials.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was a gift from the estate of Frederick J. Mahaffey, 2012-2013.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of correspondence, photographs, and memorabilia relating to Frederick J. Mahaffey, BArch, 1953. Included are letters written to a friend, George Browner Cash, BArch 1956; photographs of a student architecture project to build a geodesic dome; eulogy by Mahaffey for Nelson J. Palmer, BArch 1953; and related academic materials.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: The collection forms part of Yale Record Group 45 (YRG 45), Yale objects and memorabilia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by accession.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Frederick J. Mahaffey, School of Fine Arts, Yale University, Correspondence and Memorabilia (RU 1118). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

did.unittitle: Academic materials and eulogy for Nelson J. Palmer

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access

did.unittitle: Photographic negatives of geodesic dome built by students from the Department of Architecture on the roof of Weir Hall

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Work on the dome was supervised by R. Buckminster Fuller while he was a visiting critic in architectural design at the Yale School of Fine Arts in the fall term, 1952.

did.unittitle: Prints from digitized negatives and news clipping from the Yale Daily News about the project
